name: Joining of the Elements
description:
The Game

You are the Prime Elemental, the last being who can wield the power of the elements. Now the Void Elementals are hungry for the power of the elements and will hunt you down. It is up to you to stop them and safeguard the power of the elements.

Absorb elements from the world around you and join their powers together to create powerful spells and defeat the Void Elementals.

The Controls

Movement - WASD

Attack - Left Click

Dash - Space Bar

Pause - Escape

The Team

Eli - RedZenn

That's me! I did some of the coding, most of the 3D art and animation (sorry the animation is terrible, I'm not an animator...) as well as the in-game sound effects (and a tiny bit of 2D art for the UI).

https://red-zenn.itch.io

Alex - PropellorHat

Alex did most of the coding as well as some shader wizardry. He also helped keep everyone on track with his extensive experience with game jams.

https://propellorhat.itch.io

Junn Yitt - LaksaMana

Junn Yitt made all of our wonderful UI, as well as the game design and concept art! He also helped me (not that I need it) with the 3D art.

https://itch.io/profile/laksamanatyfoon

"THEBLANK"

Our enigmatic music man. Who is he? Where did he come from? Why won't he tell us his name? We'll never know...

(He composed the battle theme for our game but doesn't have any social media :/ ).
